messages.message: Invalid pixelDepth. pixelDepth must not be 0 for block-compressed formats with non-zero block depth.
messages.details: pixelDepth is 0 but for VK_FORMAT_ASTC_6x6x5_UNORM_BLOCK_EXT (which is a block-compressed format with non-zero block depth) it must not be 0.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
